attributes.action: make discipline in schools a top priority by pushing the example set by Caroline Haynes, the headteacher of Tendring Technology College, Clacton-on-Sea, Essex
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For far too long the emphasis has been in the wrong place (ie, on targets) and Mrs Haynes' example has put the ball firmly back in the school's court regards discipline, which is where it should have been all along.

She has found a way to discipline disruptive pupils for the benefit of all at the school but especially the majority who WANT to learn and it is a good model for how all other schools should proceed in the future.

PS This is a link for an article in the Telegraph which can give more info:
http://www.telegraph.co.uk/education/secondaryeducation/3416986/Pass-rates-soar-after-headteacher-suspends-478-pupils-in-a-year.html
